scripts.test-dt: npm run test-alert && npm run test-usermanage
scripts.clean:reports: mkdir -p cypress/reports && rm -R -f cypress/reports/* && mkdir cypress/reports/mochareports
scripts.clean:reportselectron: mkdir -p cypress/reports && rm -R -f cypress/reports/mochareports-electron/* && mkdir cypress/reports/mochareports-electron
scripts.clean:reportschrome: mkdir -p cypress/reports && rm -R -f cypress/reports/mochareports-chrome/* && mkdir cypress/reports/mochareports-chrome
scripts.clean:reportsfirefox: mkdir -p cypress/reports && rm -R -f cypress/reports/mochareports-firefox/* && mkdir cypress/reports/mochareports-firefox
scripts.mochaposttestelectron: npm run combine-reportselectron && npm run generate-reportelectron
scripts.mochaposttestchrome: npm run combine-reportschrome && npm run generate-reportchrome
scripts.mochaposttestfirefox: npm run combine-reportsfirefox && npm run generate-reportfirefox
scripts.electrontest-mocha: npm run mochapretestelectron && npm run scripts || npm run mochaposttestelectron
scripts.chrometest-mocha: npm run mochapretestchrome && npm run chrome-test || npm run mochaposttestchrome
scripts.firefoxtest-mocha: npm run mochapretestfirefox && npm run firefox-test || npm run mochaposttestfirefox
scripts.allure:clear: if exist allure-results rmdir /q /s allure-results && if exist allure-report rmdir /q /s allure-report && if exist cypress\screenshots rmdir /q /s cypress\screenshots && if exist cypress\videos rmdir /q /s cypress\videos
scripts.testallure: npm run cy:run || npm run allureposttest
